SourceAnalyzer.Name: Spacing Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Rules which verify the spacing placed between keywords and symbols in the code.

Rule.Name: KeywordsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: The spacing around the keyword '{0}' is invalid.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a reserved keyword.

Rule.Name: CommasMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the comma.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and a comma.

Rule.Name: SemicolonsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the semicolon.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and a semicolon.

Rule.Name: SymbolsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: The spacing around the symbol '{0}' is invalid.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after an operator symbol.

Rule.Name: DocumentationLinesMustBeginWithSingleSpace
Rule.Context: The documentation header line must start with a single space.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the forward slashes at the beginning of an documentation header line are followed by a single space.

Rule.Name: SingleLineCommentsMustBeginWithSingleSpace
Rule.Context: The comment must start with a single space. To ignore this error when commenting out a line of code, begin the comment with '////' rather than '//'.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the forward slashes at the beginning of a comment are followed by a single space.

Rule.Name: PreprocessorKeywordsMustNotBePrecededBySpace
Rule.Context: The preprocessor type keyword must not be preceded by a space.
Rule.Description: Verifies that there is no space between the opening hash mark and keyword within a preprocessor statement.

Rule.Name: OperatorKeywordMustBeFollowedBySpace
Rule.Context: The operator keyword must be followed by a space.
Rule.Description: Verifies that there is a single space between the 'operator' keyword and the operator symbol within an operator overload.

Rule.Name: OpeningParenthesisMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the opening parenthesis.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after an opening parenthesis.

Rule.Name: ClosingParenthesisMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the closing parenthesis.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a closing parenthesis.

Rule.Name: OpeningSquareBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the opening square bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after an opening square bracket.

Rule.Name: ClosingSquareBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the closing square bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a closing square bracket.

Rule.Name: OpeningCurlyBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the opening curly bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after an opening curly bracket.

Rule.Name: ClosingCurlyBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the closing curly bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a closing curly bracket.

Rule.Name: OpeningGenericBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the opening generic bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after an opening bracket in a generic type.

Rule.Name: ClosingGenericBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the closing generic bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a closing bracket in a generic type.

Rule.Name: OpeningAttributeBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the opening attribute bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after an opening attribute bracket.

Rule.Name: ClosingAttributeBracketsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the closing attribute bracket.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a closing attribute bracket.

Rule.Name: NullableTypeSymbolsMustNotBePrecededBySpace
Rule.Context: A nullable type symbol should not be preceded by white space.
Rule.Description: Verifies that a nullable type symbol is not preceded by white space.

Rule.Name: MemberAccessSymbolsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the member access symbol.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a member access symbol.

Rule.Name: IncrementDecrementSymbolsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the increment or decrement symbol.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after an increment or decrement symbol.

Rule.Name: NegativeSignsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the negative sign.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a negative sign.

Rule.Name: PositiveSignsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the positive sign.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a positive sign.

Rule.Name: DereferenceAndAccessOfSymbolsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the dereference or address-of symbol.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a dereference or address-of symbol.

Rule.Name: ColonsMustBeSpacedCorrectly
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing around the colon.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing before and after a colon.

Rule.Name: CodeMustNotContainMultipleWhitespaceInARow
Rule.Context: The code contains multiple spaces in a row. Only one space is needed.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the code does not contain more than one spacing in a row.

Rule.Name: CodeMustNotContainSpaceAfterNewKeywordInImplicitlyTypedArrayAllocation
Rule.Context: There should be no space between the new keyword and the opening square bracket in an implicitly typed array allocation.
Rule.Description: Verifies that there is no space between the new keyword and the opening square bracket in an implicitly typed array allocation.

Rule.Name: TabsMustNotBeUsed
Rule.Context: Tabs are not allowed. Use spaces instead.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the code does not contain tabs.

Rule.Name: DoNotSplitNullConditionalOperators
Rule.Context: Do not split null conditional operator ('?.') or ('?').
Rule.Description: Verifies that the code does not contain new rows or spaces.
